item.description:
bwin GRANDE PREMIO DE PORTUGAL

THIS RACE STARTS AT 5PM EST on SPEED.

Here you can find all the useful information about the Estoril circuit, host of the 17th round of the 2010 MotoGP World Championship.

CIRCUIT INFO

Pole Position: Left
Length: 4 182 m / 2.599 miles
Width: 14 m
Right corners: 9
Left corners: 4
Longest straight: 986 m / 0.613 miles

CIRCUIT RECORD:
MotoGP 1’36.937 – D. Pedrosa (SPA) ’09, Honda
250cc 1'40. 521 – A. Bautista (SPA), ’07, Aprilia
125cc 1'45.027 – G. Talmacsi (HUN), ‚07, Aprilia

2009 winners:
MotoGP J. Lorenzo (SPA), Yamaha
250cc M. Simoncelli (ITA), Gilera
125cc P. Espargaro (SPA), Derbi

**THIS IS NOT AN OFFICIAL MEETUP. If there is enough interest, maybe we can get something together**
item.name: Moto GP World Championship - bwin Grande Premio De Portugal
